mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON (Q.QNA_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET QNA_ANSWER = #{qnaAnswer} , ANSWER_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_NO, QNA_WRITER, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent})
